Class Interpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.math.Interpolator

  • public class Interpolator
extends java.lang.Object
    An easy to use Interpolation handler.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

      Stores the current time that the interpolation has been running for.
